idea-plugin.name: Xross State Machine Editor
idea-plugin.description:
Xross State Machine Editor is a no-code tool for building state machine.
To create a state machine, follow these steps:
1. create state machine model file from file -> new -> Xross State Machine
2. Create a state machine and give it a name in properties.
3. Create start node, state node and end node in the state machine you created.
4. Link nodes with transition
5. Create event and bundle to the transition.
6. Use runtime to load the model and handle event in your application. You can download and play with the example to quick start with it. It demonstrates how to use runtime and how to work with event.
